title: Transmigrated As My Former Uncle’s Sweetheart - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Medical Knowledge   Older Love Interests   Poisons   Schemes And Conspiracies   Transmigration
author: Chu Yue
description: Lu Liangwei wakes up to find herself transmigrated as a supporting character in the novel she had been reading a few days ago. According to the novel, this character has everything—beauty, wealth, status—except brains. Before Liangwei had taken over, she even went as far as to hang herself for the male protagonist that she loved: the Crown Prince as well as her sister's lover. Now that she has become a 'brand new' person, it is time for her to turn her life around with charm and wit! She will get everyone to fall in love with her, even the Crown Prince's uncle—the Emperor! Who needs a prince when you can become the Empress herself?>
